name: Hikoboshi [Sacred Swimsuit]
skill: Restores 3635/4335 HP. Targets receive 63%/75% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Sharply increases DMG dealt when Orihime [Sky Flower] is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a cowherd from the story of Tanabata. He was only allowed to meet his beloved Orihime once a year. However, his fate was radically changed by Amanogawa, who was perpetually observing the two of them. Now he works harder than ever and vows to treasure to each and every second given to him.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" Event: Clear Chapter 5.
◦ "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" Event: Exchange for 5000 Wish Tablet.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Moderately increases the drop rate of Wish Tablet during the "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" event.
◦ He is also referred to as Altair Aquila

main: "Next time I'll be stronger, and I won't lose again."
